server.commands

Interface Command

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcceptTrade_Command, BuildCity_Command, BuildRoad_Command, BuildSettlement_Command, BuyDevCard_Command, DiscardCards_Command, FinishTurn_Command, MaritimeTrade_Command, OfferTrade_Command, PlayMonopoly_Command, PlayMonument_Command, PlayRoadBuilding_Command, PlaySoldier_Command, PlayYearOfPlenty_Command, RobPlayer_Command, RollNumber_Command, SendChat_Command

    public interface Command
    Command pattern object which is extended by all subtypes. Consists of an execute function, and shared information between all commands.
